title: The AI coding trap
summary:
This article argues that while AI coding agents like Claude Code can dramatically speed up code generation, they can paradoxically hinder overall software development productivity. The author dubs this phenomenon the "AI coding trap," contrasting the promise of "10x faster" code with the marginal gains seen in real-world software delivery.

The core problem is that AI excels at generating code in isolation, but struggles with the broader context of complex systems. This leads to engineers spending more time understanding and fixing AI-generated code, a task that overshadows the fun and innovative aspects of coding. It also draws parallels to the "tech lead's dilemma," where experienced leads prioritize individual speed over team growth by hogging the most challenging tasks.

The article proposes that AI coding agents are best viewed as "lightning-fast junior engineers." To avoid the trap, the author advocates for adopting best practices from traditional software development and viewing AI as a tool to augment, not replace, human engineers. The solution is to integrate AI into every stage of the software development lifecycle, from specification and documentation to modular design, test-driven development, coding standards, and monitoring. This requires a shift in focus from simply writing code faster to building maintainable, scalable systems that benefit from the strengths of both humans and AI. Ultimately, by treating AI agents as junior engineers needing guidance and structure, we can unlock their potential and amplify our ability to deliver working software.
chinese_title: 人工智能编码陷阱
chinese_summary:
本文认为，虽然像Claude Code这样的人工智能编码代理可以显著加快代码生成速度，但它们也可能适得其反地阻碍整体软件开发效率。作者将这种现象称为“AI编码陷阱”，将“快10倍”的代码生成承诺与现实世界软件交付中看到的边际收益进行了对比。

核心问题在于，人工智能擅长独立生成代码，但在复杂系统的更广泛环境中却显得力不从心。这导致工程师花费更多时间理解和修复人工智能生成的代码，这项任务掩盖了编码的乐趣和创新方面。 这也与“技术主管的困境”类似，即经验丰富的领导者优先考虑个人速度而非团队成长，霸占最具挑战性的任务。

文章提出，最好将人工智能编码代理视为“速度极快的初级工程师”。为了避免陷入陷阱，作者倡导采用传统软件开发的最佳实践，并将人工智能视为增强而非取代人类工程师的工具。 解决方案是将人工智能集成到软件开发生命周期的每个阶段，从规范和文档到模块化设计、测试驱动开发、编码标准和监控。 这需要将重点从简单地更快地编写代码转变为构建可维护、可扩展的系统，从而受益于人类和人工智能的优势。 最终，通过将人工智能代理视为需要指导和结构的初级工程师，我们可以释放他们的潜力，并扩大我们交付可工作软件的能力。

title: Privacy Badger is a free browser extension made by EFF to stop spying
summary:
Privacy Badger, a free browser extension by the EFF, automatically blocks companies from tracking you online. It differs from traditional ad blockers by focusing on privacy, only blocking ads if they track you. It uses algorithms, not human-curated lists, to identify and block trackers based on their behavior, not pre-defined lists.

Privacy Badger learns to block domains that track users across multiple websites, especially if they ignore Do Not Track (DNT) and Global Privacy Control (GPC) signals. It blocks third-party trackers and also removes outgoing link click tracking on Facebook and Google. Red sliders in the Privacy Badger menu indicate completely disallowed content, yellow means cookie-blocking, and green means no action.

The extension aims to incentivize advertisers to respect user privacy by blocking those who don't. By sending GPC and DNT signals, Privacy Badger requests companies to respect your privacy and enforces this by blocking non-compliant trackers. It analyzes cookies, blocking those with unique tracking IDs while allowing those with low entropy, like language preferences.

Developed by the Electronic Frontier Foundation, Privacy Badger is available for Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Opera. To avoid being blocked, domains should respect DNT and GPC signals. Domains can also post EFF's DNT policy on their website as a promise of compliance.
chinese_title: 隐私獾是由 EFF 开发的一款免费浏览器扩展，旨在阻止跟踪监视。
chinese_summary:
Privacy Badger，一款由 EFF 提供的免费浏览器扩展，可自动阻止公司在线跟踪您。它与传统的广告拦截器不同，专注于隐私，仅当广告跟踪您时才会阻止广告。它使用算法而非人工编辑的列表，根据跟踪器的行为而非预定义的列表来识别和阻止跟踪器。

Privacy Badger 会学习阻止跨多个网站跟踪用户的域名，尤其是在这些域名忽略“请勿跟踪”(DNT) 和“全局隐私控制”(GPC) 信号时。它可以阻止第三方跟踪器，还可以删除 Facebook 和 Google 上的外部链接点击跟踪。Privacy Badger 菜单中的红色滑块表示完全禁止的内容，黄色表示阻止 Cookie，绿色表示不采取任何操作。

该扩展旨在通过阻止不尊重用户隐私的广告商来激励他们尊重用户隐私。通过发送 GPC 和 DNT 信号，Privacy Badger 请求公司尊重您的隐私，并通过阻止不合规的跟踪器来强制执行此要求。它会分析 Cookie，阻止具有唯一跟踪 ID 的 Cookie，同时允许具有低熵值的 Cookie，例如语言偏好。

Privacy Badger 由电子前哨基金会 (Electronic Frontier Foundation) 开发，适用于 Chrome、Firefox、Edge 和 Opera。为了避免被阻止，域名应尊重 DNT 和 GPC 信号。域名也可以在其网站上发布 EFF 的 DNT 政策，作为遵守承诺。

title: When I say "alphabetical order", I mean "alphabetical order"
summary:
The author recounts a frustrating experience of files named with timestamps (IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmss) not sorting correctly in alphabetical order across various operating systems and file managers (Windows, Google Drive, KDE Dolphin, Gnome, phone file managers). They expected alphabetical sorting to equal chronological order due to the naming convention.

The issue arose because files from the author's and their father's Android phones were mixed, with all the author's files appearing first, even though some had later timestamps than the father's files. Initially, the author suspected a bug or different character encoding. However, `ls -l` in Linux sorted the files correctly.

The problem stemmed from the file managers employing a "natural sort" algorithm. This algorithm treats numerical sequences within filenames as numbers, not just characters. Thus, "file-9.txt" is sorted before "file-10.txt" as expected by a human, but not by true alphabetical sorting.

The author's phone included an additional underscore separating seconds and milliseconds in the filename ("IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmss_mmm.jpg"), whereas the father's phone didn't ("IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmssmmm.jpg"). Because the file managers employed "natural sort", the author's phone's files were sorted correctly based on timestamps, while the father's phone's files were treated as having much higher number at the end and so placed at the beginning.

The author concludes by lamenting the trend of software "reading minds" and deviating from strict, literal interpretation of user commands, and expressing a desire for computers to simply do what they are instructed.
chinese_title: 我说“字母顺序”的时候，我指的就是“字母顺序”。
chinese_summary:
作者叙述了一段令人沮丧的经历：以时间戳命名（IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmss）的文件在各种操作系统和文件管理器（Windows、Google Drive、KDE Dolphin、Gnome、手机文件管理器）中无法按字母顺序正确排序。他们原本期望按字母顺序排序的结果应等于按时间顺序排列，因为命名约定如此。

问题产生的原因是作者和其父亲的安卓手机拍摄的文件混合在一起，作者的所有文件都显示在前面，即使其中一些文件的时间戳晚于父亲的文件。起初，作者怀疑是漏洞或不同的字符编码。然而，Linux中的`ls -l`命令可以正确地对文件进行排序。

问题根源在于文件管理器采用了“自然排序”算法。该算法将文件名中的数字序列视为数字，而不仅仅是字符。因此，"file-9.txt"会如人们期望的那样排在"file-10.txt"之前，但这并非真正的字母排序。

作者的手机在文件名中包含一个额外的下划线分隔秒和毫秒（"IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmss_mmm.jpg"），而父亲的手机没有（"IMG_YYYYMMDD_HHmmssmmm.jpg"）。由于文件管理器采用了“自然排序”，作者手机的文件根据时间戳正确排序，而父亲手机的文件则被视为结尾处具有更高的数字，因此被放置在最前面。

作者最后感叹软件“揣测人心”并偏离严格、字面意义上的用户指令的趋势，并表达了希望计算机简单地执行指令的愿望。

title: Why I'm not rushing to take sides in the RubyGems fiasco
summary:
This article explains why the author is hesitant to take sides in the 2025 RubyGems controversy. He believes the public narrative is one-sided and stems from unresolved conflicts between key figures in the Ruby ecosystem, primarily involving Andre Arko and Ruby Central.

The author details concerns about Ruby Together, a non-profit founded by Arko to fund open-source development, which was later absorbed by Ruby Central. He recounts stories and incidents suggesting potential misuse of funds and leveraging control over Bundler (a key Ruby dependency manager) for financial gain. These include allegations of misleading donors about fund allocation, proposing to rate-limit RubyGems.org access unless companies paid Ruby Together, and publicly shaming companies like Shopify for not sponsoring the organization.

The author highlights a leaked Ruby Together board meeting discussing revenue-generating strategies, including rate-limiting RubyGems.org. He also mentions a public backlash against Arko's addition of a "post-install message" urging users to fund Ruby Together. Ruby Central later clarified that Ruby Together's fundraising efforts were distinct from RubyGems.org's operational costs.

Finally, the author recounts an instance where Arko accused Google of copying code and threatened legal action while simultaneously complaining about Google's failure to fund Ruby Together, which turned out to be baseless. The author connects this past behavior to more recent actions.

The author concludes that while Ruby Central's handling of the current situation is problematic, the historical context and concerns about Arko's past actions make him wary of a simple "good vs. evil" interpretation of the current events.
chinese_title: 我为什么不急于在RubyGems风波中站队
chinese_summary:
本文解释了作者为何对 2025 年 RubyGems 争议持谨慎态度，不愿轻易站队。他认为目前的公开叙述过于片面，源于 Ruby 生态系统中关键人物之间未解决的冲突，主要涉及 Andre Arko 和 Ruby Central。

作者详细阐述了对 Ruby Together 的担忧，这是一个由 Arko 创立的旨在资助开源开发的非营利组织，后来被 Ruby Central 吸收。他叙述了一些故事和事件，暗示可能存在资金滥用和利用对 Bundler（一个关键的 Ruby 依赖管理器）的控制来获取经济利益的行为。这些包括关于误导捐助者资金分配、提议限制 RubyGems.org 访问除非公司向 Ruby Together 付费、以及公开羞辱像 Shopify 这样的公司不赞助该组织的指控。

作者重点介绍了泄露的 Ruby Together 董事会会议，会议讨论了包括限制 RubyGems.org 访问在内的创收策略。他还提到了公众对 Arko 添加“安装后消息”敦促用户资助 Ruby Together 的强烈反对。Ruby Central 后来澄清说，Ruby Together 的筹款活动与 RubyGems.org 的运营成本是分开的。

最后，作者回忆了一个案例，Arko 指责 Google 抄袭代码并威胁采取法律行动，同时抱怨 Google 未能资助 Ruby Together，但最终证实这是毫无根据的。作者将这种过去的行径与最近的行动联系起来。

作者总结说，虽然 Ruby Central 对当前情况的处理存在问题，但历史背景以及对 Arko 过去行为的担忧使他对当前事件的简单“善与恶”的解读持谨慎态度。

title: Testing "Exotic" P2P VPN
summary:
This article details the author's exploration of alternative P2P VPN solutions to Wireguard, driven by Wireguard's blockage in a specific country and a desire for a more decentralized, self-hosted, and ideologically sound solution. The author tests EasyTier, Nebula, and Tinc, evaluating them based on ease of use, security, performance, and compatibility with Nix packaging.

EasyTier is praised for its simplicity and automatic connection establishment via various protocols (TCP, UDP, WG, WS, WSS). However, it lacks IP binding and raises ideological concerns due to its Chinese origin. Nebula, from the creators of Slack, offers more security features like elliptic curve encryption and its own PKI but suffers from a clunky SSH-based configuration and disappointing performance. Tinc, an older project, surprisingly performs well, leveraging its own protocol over UDP, elliptic curves, and documented black magic for direct node-to-node communication.

The author outlines a methodology for measurement, including ICMP pings, SSH data transfer using /dev/zero, Wget downloads, and IPerf2 and IPerf3 tests, acknowledging the potential inaccuracies of IPerf. Testing is conducted using a home laptop, a public Lighthouse server, and a Raspberry Pi behind a firewall.

The results reveal that Tinc provides the best performance in terms of speed, while EasyTier is deemed acceptable given its ad-hoc nature. Nebula's performance is considered disappointing. Despite its flaws, the author plans to use all three VPNs, suggesting that a multi-VPN approach is preferable to relying solely on one solution.
chinese_title: 测试“异构”P2P VPN
chinese_summary:
本文详细介绍了作者对 Wireguard 的替代 P2P VPN 解决方案的探索，起因是 Wireguard 在特定国家/地区受到封锁，以及对更去中心化、自托管和符合意识形态的解决方案的渴望。 作者测试了 EasyTier、Nebula 和 Tinc，并根据易用性、安全性、性能以及与 Nix 打包的兼容性对它们进行了评估。

EasyTier 因其简单性以及通过各种协议（TCP、UDP、WG、WS、WSS）自动建立连接而受到赞扬。 然而，它缺乏 IP 绑定，并且由于其中国血统而引起了意识形态方面的担忧。 来自 Slack 创始人的 Nebula 提供了更多的安全功能，如椭圆曲线加密和其自身的 PKI，但其基于 SSH 的配置笨拙，性能令人失望。 Tinc 是一个较旧的项目，出人意料地表现良好，利用其自身基于 UDP 的协议、椭圆曲线以及记录在案的用于直接节点到节点通信的“黑魔法”。

作者概述了一种测量方法，包括 ICMP ping、使用 /dev/zero 的 SSH 数据传输、Wget 下载以及 IPerf2 和 IPerf3 测试，并承认 IPerf 可能存在不准确之处。 测试是在一台家用笔记本电脑、一台公共 Lighthouse 服务器和一台位于防火墙后面的 Raspberry Pi 上进行的。

结果表明，Tinc 在速度方面提供了最佳性能，而 EasyTier 鉴于其临时性质，被认为是可接受的。 Nebula 的性能被认为令人失望。 尽管存在缺陷，作者计划使用所有三个 VPN，这表明多 VPN 方法优于仅依赖一个解决方案。

title: Supermicro server motherboards can be infected with unremovable malware
summary:
This article details critical vulnerabilities found in Supermicro server motherboards that allow attackers to install persistent, undetectable malware, even before the operating system boots. Security firm Binarly discovered that an incomplete patch for a previously known vulnerability (CVE-2024-10237) could still be exploited. They also uncovered a new vulnerability (CVE-2025-7937 and CVE-2025-6198).

These flaws reside in the Baseboard Management Controller (BMC), which controls remote server management functions and allows for reflashing the UEFI firmware. Attackers can exploit these vulnerabilities to replace legitimate firmware with malicious versions, bypassing security checks. This provides "unprecedented persistence," potentially leading to data destruction or supply chain attacks where firmware update servers are compromised.

Exploitation requires prior administrative access to the BMC or compromising firmware update servers. The vulnerabilities allow attackers to manipulate the "fwmap table" to inject malicious code into the bootloader.

Supermicro claims to have updated BMC firmware to address the issue and advises customers to check release notes, but Binarly reports that the updated firmware is not yet publicly available. The difficult nature of the fix suggests it may take more time for Supermicro to fully resolve the vulnerabilities.
chinese_title: 超微服务器主板可能感染无法移除的恶意软件
chinese_summary:
Supermicro服务器主板存在关键漏洞，攻击者可在操作系统启动前安装持久性、无法检测的恶意软件。安全公司Binarly发现，先前已知漏洞 (CVE-2024-10237) 的不完整补丁仍然可以被利用。他们还发现了新的漏洞 (CVE-2025-7937 和 CVE-2025-6198)。

这些缺陷存在于基板管理控制器 (BMC) 中，该控制器控制远程服务器管理功能并允许重新刷新 UEFI 固件。攻击者可以利用这些漏洞用恶意版本替换合法的固件，绕过安全检查。这提供了“前所未有的持久性”，可能导致数据破坏或供应链攻击，其中固件更新服务器被入侵。

利用需要事先获得对 BMC 的管理访问权限或入侵固件更新服务器。这些漏洞允许攻击者操纵“fwmap 表”以将恶意代码注入到引导加载程序中。

Supermicro 声称已更新 BMC 固件以解决此问题，并建议客户查看发行说明，但 Binarly 报告称更新后的固件尚未公开提供。修复的困难性表明 Supermicro 可能需要更多时间才能完全解决这些漏洞。

title: Show HN: Toolbrew – Free little tools without signups or ads
summary: Toolbrew is a website featuring a collection of free and useful online tools. The key selling points are that these tools are clean (presumably simple and easy to use) and available without requiring users to sign up for an account or be bombarded with advertisements. The core idea is to offer a library of helpful utilities that are easily accessible and straightforward to use, prioritizing user experience by removing common frustrations associated with online tool usage like mandatory registration and disruptive ads.
chinese_title: Show HN: Toolbrew – 无需注册或广告的免费小工具集
chinese_summary: Toolbrew是一个提供免费且实用在线工具的网站。其主要卖点是这些工具干净（可能意味着简单易用），且无需用户注册账号或被大量广告轰炸即可使用。核心理念是提供一个易于访问和使用便捷的实用工具库，通过消除强制注册和干扰性广告等在线工具使用中的常见问题，来优先考虑用户体验。

title: Man still alive six months after pig kidney transplant
summary:
A 67-year-old man, Tim Andrews, with end-stage kidney disease, is still alive more than six months after receiving a genetically modified pig kidney in January. This marks a significant milestone in xenotransplantation, the longest a pig organ has survived in a living human. Andrews, who had been on dialysis for over two years, is now dialysis-free.

The kidney came from a pig with three types of genetic modifications: removal of three antigens to prevent rejection, addition of seven human genes to reduce inflammation and bleeding risks, and deactivation of retroviruses. Andrews was one of three patients to receive such transplants from eGenesis on compassionate grounds.

Experts consider reaching six months a major success, as this is the period of highest risk for complications like anemia and graft rejection. While a previous recipient, Towana Looney, had a functioning pig kidney for over four months, it was eventually removed due to rejection. Reaching 12 months would be another important achievement. The success of this case offers hope for the future of xenotransplantation as a solution for organ shortages.
chinese_title: 猪肾移植六个月后男子仍然存活
chinese_summary:
一位67岁的男子蒂姆·安德鲁斯，患有终末期肾病，在今年一月接受基因改造猪肾后，存活至今已超过六个月。这标志着异种移植领域的一个重要里程碑，也是猪器官在活人体内存活时间最长的一次。安德鲁斯此前已透析两年多，现在已无需透析。

该肾脏来自一头经过三种基因改造的猪：去除三种抗原以防止排异，添加七个人类基因以降低炎症和出血风险，以及灭活逆转录病毒。安德鲁斯是eGenesis公司出于同情考虑，进行此类移植的三名患者之一。

专家认为达到六个月是一个重大成功，因为这是发生贫血和移植排斥等并发症风险最高的时期。此前，接受者托瓦娜·卢尼的猪肾功能正常维持了四个多月，但最终因排异而被移除。达到12个月将是另一个重要的成就。该案例的成功为异种移植作为解决器官短缺的方案带来了希望。

title: Show HN: Built an MCP server using Cloudflare's Code Mode pattern
summary:
This "Show HN" post introduces a Cloudflare Code Mode-inspired implementation for MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers, aiming to improve LLM interaction with MCPs. Instead of relying on direct tool calling, the approach utilizes the LLM's coding ability by providing it with a single `execute_code` tool. This tool executes TypeScript/JavaScript code that interacts with a local HTTP proxy, which then forwards requests to the actual MCP servers.

The key benefit is that LLMs are better at writing code than using tools directly, allowing for more complex orchestration and chaining of operations. The setup involves installing Bun and Deno, configuring the server with `codemode-config.json`, and defining MCP server configurations in `.mcp.json` files.

The server offers proxy endpoints for listing servers, tools, and calling tools. Example workflows demonstrate single MCP server calls and chaining operations using `fetch` within the executed code. Security is ensured through a Deno sandbox, limiting access to network communication via the proxy, a 30-second execution timeout, and automatic temporary file cleanup. The post also includes troubleshooting tips and potential future improvements, such as a simpler API and more configuration options. The code is based on a Deno remix from a separate project, and aims to leverage the composition benefits of writing code instead of relying on direct tool calls.
chinese_title: Show HN: 用 Cloudflare 代码模式模式构建了一个 MCP 服务器
chinese_summary:
此“Show HN”帖子介绍了一个受 Cloudflare Code Mode 启发的 MCP（模型上下文协议）服务器实现，旨在改进 LLM 与 MCP 的交互。该方法没有依赖直接工具调用，而是通过提供一个 `execute_code` 工具，利用 LLM 的编码能力。该工具执行 TypeScript/JavaScript 代码，与本地 HTTP 代理交互，然后将请求转发到实际的 MCP 服务器。

主要优势在于，LLM 更擅长编写代码而不是直接使用工具，从而可以实现更复杂的编排和操作链。该设置涉及安装 Bun 和 Deno，使用 `codemode-config.json` 配置服务器，并在 `.mcp.json` 文件中定义 MCP 服务器配置。

服务器提供用于列出服务器、工具和调用工具的代理端点。示例工作流程演示了单个 MCP 服务器调用以及使用已执行代码中的 `fetch` 进行的链式操作。通过 Deno 沙箱确保安全性，该沙箱限制通过代理进行网络通信的访问、30 秒的执行超时以及自动临时文件清理。该帖子还包括故障排除技巧和潜在的未来改进，例如更简单的 API 和更多的配置选项。该代码基于来自一个单独项目的 Deno remix，旨在利用编写代码而不是依赖直接工具调用所带来的组合优势。

title: Beyond OpenMP in C++ and Rust: Taskflow, Rayon, Fork Union
summary:
This article argues that many popular C++ and Rust thread pool libraries, like Taskflow and Rayon, perform significantly worse than OpenMP for fork-join parallel workloads, often by a factor of 10. This is attributed to the "four horsemen of low performance": locks & mutexes, heap allocations, compare-and-swap stalls, and false sharing.

To address this, the author introduces Fork Union, a minimal (300-line) library that achieves performance within 20% of OpenMP, using only standard library features. Benchmarks demonstrate Fork Union's superior performance compared to libraries like Taskflow, Rayon, Tokio, and even using `std::thread` directly. The key takeaway is to avoid asynchronous task queues and their associated overhead for simple parallel reductions.

The article further elaborates on the performance pitfalls of locks, memory allocations, atomics, and false sharing. While acknowledging the advanced features of libraries like Rayon and Taskflow, it emphasizes the importance of choosing the right tool for the job. Fork Union offers a simpler API focused on fork-join parallelism, including `for_each_thread`, `for_each_static`, `for_each_slice`, and `for_each_dynamic`. The article concludes that avoiding mutexes, dynamic queues, CAS operations, and false sharing is crucial for achieving high performance in parallel computing, regardless of the language used.
chinese_title: C++和Rust中OpenMP之外的选择：Taskflow、Rayon、Fork Union
chinese_summary:
本文指出，许多流行的C++和Rust线程池库，如Taskflow和Rayon，在fork-join并行工作负载下的性能远低于OpenMP，通常差一个数量级。这归因于“低性能的四大杀手”：锁和互斥锁、堆分配、比较并交换停顿以及伪共享。

为了解决这个问题，作者介绍了Fork Union，一个仅使用标准库特性且代码极简（300行）的库，其性能可达到OpenMP的80%。基准测试表明，与Taskflow、Rayon、Tokio，甚至直接使用`std::thread`相比，Fork Union具有更优越的性能。关键在于，对于简单的并行规约，应避免异步任务队列及其相关开销。

本文进一步阐述了锁、内存分配、原子操作和伪共享的性能陷阱。虽然承认Rayon和Taskflow等库的高级功能，但文章强调了选择正确工具的重要性。Fork Union提供了一个更简单的API，专注于fork-join并行，包括`for_each_thread`、`for_each_static`、`for_each_slice`和`for_each_dynamic`。文章的结论是，无论使用何种语言，避免互斥锁、动态队列、CAS操作和伪共享对于在并行计算中实现高性能至关重要。

title: She Sent Her iPhone to Apple. Repair Techs Uploaded Her Nudes to Facebook (2021)
summary:
In 2016, an Oregon woman sent her iPhone to Apple for repairs and later discovered that nude photos and a sex video from her phone had been uploaded to her Facebook account by repair technicians working for Pegatron, an Apple contractor. This incident led to a multimillion-dollar settlement from Apple.

The article highlights the privacy risks associated with sending personal devices for repair, even to authorized service providers. It argues that Apple's control over the repair ecosystem, justified by security concerns, failed in this case and ultimately compromised the customer's privacy. The author advocates for "right-to-repair" legislation, empowering consumers to repair their own devices or choose trusted independent repair shops.

The case came to light due to a dispute between Apple, Pegatron, and an insurance company regarding indemnity payments for the settlement. Court records revealed the settlement amount was in the millions, although the exact figure remains undisclosed. The article also mentions other instances of Apple employees or contractors improperly accessing and sharing customer's private photos.

Critics, like iFixit CEO Kyle Wiens, argue that Apple's restrictive repair policies force customers to entrust their data to third-party contractors, increasing the risk of privacy breaches. "Right to Repair" laws, currently under consideration in various states, would give consumers more control over the repair process and potentially enhance the security of their personal data.
chinese_title: 她把iPhone送去苹果维修，维修人员将她的裸照上传到脸书（2021）
chinese_summary:
2016年，一位俄勒冈州女性将她的iPhone送去苹果公司维修，之后发现手机中的裸照和性爱视频被苹果承包商和硕的维修技术人员上传到了她的Facebook账户。 该事件导致苹果公司支付了数百万美元的赔偿金。

这篇文章强调了将个人设备送去维修（即使是授权服务提供商）所带来的隐私风险。文章认为，苹果公司以安全为由对维修生态系统的控制，在此案例中失效，最终损害了客户的隐私。作者提倡“维修权”立法， 赋予消费者维修自己设备或选择信任的独立维修店的权利。

该案件的曝光源于苹果公司、和硕和一家保险公司之间关于赔偿金支付的纠纷。法庭记录显示，和解金额达数百万美元，尽管确切数字仍未公开。文章还提及了其他苹果公司员工或承包商不正当访问和分享客户私人照片的案例。

像iFixit首席执行官Kyle Wiens这样的批评人士认为，苹果公司限制性的维修政策迫使客户将他们的数据委托给第三方承包商，增加了隐私泄露的风险。目前各州正在审议的“维修权”法案将赋予消费者对维修过程更多的控制权，并可能增强他们个人数据的安全性。

title: Learn to play Go
summary: This "Learn to play Go" article is essentially a call to action, directing readers to online-go.com (OGS) to learn and play Go. The core message is simple: OGS is a platform where you can learn and play the game of Go online. The "Loading..." likely indicates a dynamic element, suggesting that the OGS platform offers interactive tutorials, game play options, or other resources to help users learn the game. The title and the concise body strongly suggest OGS is being promoted as a key resource for new Go players.
chinese_title: 学习下围棋
chinese_summary: 这篇“学习围棋”文章本质上是一个行动号召，引导读者前往online-go.com (OGS) 学习和下围棋。 核心信息很简单：OGS是一个你可以在线学习和玩围棋的平台。“加载中...”可能表明存在动态元素，暗示OGS平台提供互动教程、游戏选项或其他资源来帮助用户学习游戏。标题和简洁的内容强烈表明OGS正在被推广为新围棋玩家的关键资源。

title: Swiss voters back e-ID and abolish rental tax
summary: Swiss voters have approved the introduction of a state-backed electronic identification (e-ID) system. The other main point is that Swiss voters have abolished the rental tax. The article also includes an unrelated news snippet stating that Eurovision members will vote on whether to exclude Israel from the competition.
chinese_title: 瑞士选民支持电子身份和废除租赁税
chinese_summary: 瑞士选民已批准引入国家支持的电子身份识别系统(e-ID)。另一个要点是，瑞士选民已废除租赁税。文章还包含一条无关的新闻简讯，称欧洲歌唱大赛成员将投票决定是否将以色列排除在比赛之外。

title: Plan 9 from User Space
summary: Plan 9 from User Space is a project that ports Plan 9 libraries and programs to Unix-like systems. To install it, users should execute the `./INSTALL` script, which builds `mk` and then uses it to complete the installation process. Detailed installation instructions are available in `install(1)` and online. Comprehensive documentation can be found at the provided website or, after installation, using the `9 man` command. `Intro(1)` highlights new features and differences from the original Plan 9 system. The project welcomes contributions, particularly ports to other architectures. Users can stay up-to-date with changes and bug fixes using Git (details in `9 man git`). For assistance or collaboration, the project offers a mailing list and an issue tracker on GitHub. Code contributions are welcomed through pull requests on GitHub. Russ Cox is the primary contact for the project.
chinese_title: 用户空间的Plan 9
chinese_summary: Plan 9 用户空间移植项目旨在将 Plan 9 的库和程序移植到类 Unix 系统。安装时，用户应执行 `./INSTALL` 脚本，该脚本会构建 `mk`，然后使用它完成安装过程。详细安装说明可在 `install(1)` 和在线文档中找到。完整文档可在提供的网站或安装后使用 `9 man` 命令找到。`Intro(1)` 重点介绍了新功能以及与原始 Plan 9 系统的区别。该项目欢迎贡献，尤其是移植到其他架构。用户可以使用 Git 了解最新变更和错误修复（详情请参阅 `9 man git`）。为了获得帮助或协作，该项目提供了一个邮件列表和一个 GitHub 上的 issue 跟踪器。欢迎通过 GitHub 上的 pull request 贡献代码。Russ Cox 是该项目的主要联系人。

title: Python developers are embracing type hints
summary:
This article champions the adoption of type hints in Python to improve code quality, maintainability, and scalability. Python's dynamic typing, while initially advantageous for rapid prototyping and experimentation, can lead to reliability issues as projects grow and transition to production environments.

PEP 484 introduced static typing features to Python, allowing developers to incrementally add type annotations without breaking existing code. This gradual typing system enables developers to specify the expected data types of function arguments and return values.

The benefits of using type hints include early bug detection through static analysis, self-documenting code that enhances readability and refactoring safety, and improved scalability as code transitions from proof-of-concept to production-ready systems. Type hints act as contracts between different development stages, especially crucial in AI and machine learning workflows.

The article advises developers to start adding type hints early in a project and recommends installing a type checker like PyreFly. It also highlights the importance of leveraging available resources, such as official documentation, PEPs, and community forums, to deepen understanding and proficiency in Python typing.

Ultimately, the article advocates for a practical investment in code's future, with type hints leading to reduced debugging, smoother code reviews, fewer production issues, and the confidence to scale codebases effectively.
chinese_title: Python开发者正在拥抱类型提示。
chinese_summary:
本文倡导在Python中采用类型提示，以提高代码质量、可维护性和可扩展性。Python的动态类型，虽然最初有利于快速原型设计和实验，但随着项目增长和向生产环境过渡，可能会导致可靠性问题。

PEP 484为Python引入了静态类型特性，允许开发者逐步添加类型注解，而不会破坏现有代码。这种渐进式类型系统使开发者能够指定函数参数和返回值的预期数据类型。

使用类型提示的好处包括通过静态分析提前发现错误，自文档化的代码增强可读性和重构安全性，以及随着代码从概念验证到生产就绪系统的过渡而提高可扩展性。类型提示充当不同开发阶段之间的契约，尤其是在人工智能和机器学习工作流程中至关重要。

本文建议开发者尽早开始在项目中添加类型提示，并建议安装像PyreFly这样的类型检查器。它还强调了利用可用资源（如官方文档、PEPs和社区论坛）来加深对Python类型的理解和熟练程度的重要性。

最终，本文倡导对代码未来进行切实的投资，类型提示可以减少调试、简化代码审查、减少生产问题，并有信心有效地扩展代码库。

title: Time travel? Or, just clever technology
summary:
This blog post from SyncDNA explains how their technology overcomes the limitations of internet latency to achieve seamless remote collaboration for audio and video production, despite the constraints imposed by the speed of light and internet infrastructure.

The article highlights that real-time collaboration is challenging due to inherent latency issues, including the physical distance data travels, the slowdown in fiber optic cables, and the delays introduced by internet routers. Human perception of latency further exacerbates the problem.

SyncDNA's solution avoids trying to eliminate latency. Instead, it strategically introduces defined delays at each point in the media's journey. This creates a buffer that allows for high-quality audio and video transfer without interruptions, even on imperfect connections. The receiving devices then compensate for the added delay, precisely realigning the media.

The key is manipulating the perception of "now." By temporally separating recording events, SyncDNA ensures media arrives before the intended playback time. This allows performers, producers, and reviewers to collaborate as if they were in the same room. For example, in a recording session, a backing track is sent with a delay, the performer records their part, which is then sent back with another delay, ensuring everything arrives in sync. This process scales to multiple performers in different locations, enabling the creation of entire ensembles remotely. After recording, the team switches to lower-fidelity video conferencing for real-time discussion. SyncDNA argues this approach makes it possible to record music, capture podcasts, dub ADR, review film and television, and more, and invites readers to try a free trial.
chinese_title: 时间旅行？还是巧妙的技术？
chinese_summary:
SyncDNA 的这篇博文解释了他们的技术如何克服互联网延迟的限制，从而实现音频和视频制作的无缝远程协作，尽管受到光速和互联网基础设施的限制。

文章强调，由于固有的延迟问题，包括数据传输的物理距离、光纤电缆中的减速以及互联网路由器引入的延迟，实时协作具有挑战性。 人类对延迟的感知进一步加剧了这个问题。

SyncDNA 的解决方案并非试图消除延迟，而是在媒体传输过程中的每个环节策略性地引入明确的延迟。 这创建了一个缓冲区，即使在不完美的连接上，也能实现高质量的音频和视频传输而不会中断。 接收设备随后会补偿增加的延迟，从而精确地重新对齐媒体。

关键在于操纵对“现在”的感知。 通过在时间上分离录制事件，SyncDNA 确保媒体在预定的播放时间之前到达。 这使得表演者、制作人和审阅者可以像在同一个房间里一样进行协作。 例如，在录音过程中，伴奏音轨会延迟发送，表演者录制他们的部分，然后再次延迟发送回来，从而确保一切同步到达。 这个过程可以扩展到不同地点的多个表演者，从而实现远程创建整个合奏。 录音结束后，团队会切换到低保真视频会议进行实时讨论。 SyncDNA 认为这种方法可以录制音乐、捕获播客、配音 ADR、审阅电影和电视等等，并邀请读者尝试免费试用。

title: The Demon-Haunted World
summary:
Carl Sagan's "The Demon-Haunted World: Science as a Candle in the Dark" (1995) aims to equip readers with the tools of scientific skepticism, distinguishing science from pseudoscience. Sagan argues science is a way of thinking, not just a body of knowledge, emphasizing its self-correcting nature and the importance of independent validation.

A key concept is the "baloney detection kit," a set of tools for critical thinking. It includes independent confirmation of facts, encouraging debate, avoiding arguments from authority, considering multiple hypotheses, quantifying data, ensuring the validity of every step in an argument, applying Occam's razor, and focusing on falsifiability. The kit also includes recognizing logical fallacies like ad hominem attacks, appeals to ignorance, and straw man arguments.

Sagan critiques superstition, pseudoscience like UFOs and ESP, and the misuse of science, citing Edward Teller's influence and the depiction of mad scientists. He also discusses the misuse of psychiatric authority, referencing the Paul Ingram case. Hoaxes are presented as valuable tools for uncovering flaws in our thinking.

The book was a bestseller and influential in the skeptical movement. However, it has faced criticism for not addressing factors contributing to the decline of scientific thinking, such as the consequences of government funding in areas like cancer research, and for Sagan's perspective on religious ideas. Some reviewers also noted the book's length. Despite criticisms, the book is considered insightful for promoting critical thinking.
chinese_title: 妖魔缠身的世界
chinese_summary:
卡尔·萨根《魔鬼出没的世界：科学是黑暗中的蜡烛》（1995）旨在帮助读者掌握科学怀疑论的工具，区分科学与伪科学。萨根认为，科学是一种思维方式，而不仅仅是知识体系，并强调其自我修正的特性和独立验证的重要性。

一个关键概念是“胡说侦测器”，一套用于批判性思维的工具。它包括对事实的独立确认，鼓励辩论，避免诉诸权威，考虑多种假设，量化数据，确保论证中每一步的有效性，应用奥卡姆剃刀原则，以及关注可证伪性。该工具还包括识别逻辑谬误，如人身攻击、诉诸无知和稻草人论证。

萨根批判了迷信、伪科学（如不明飞行物和超感官知觉）以及对科学的滥用，并引用了爱德华·泰勒的影响和对疯狂科学家的描述。他还讨论了精神病学权威的滥用，并提及保罗·英格拉姆案件。恶作剧被视为揭示我们思维缺陷的宝贵工具。

这本书是畅销书，对怀疑论运动产生了重要影响。然而，它也面临批评，因为它没有解决导致科学思维衰退的因素，例如政府在癌症研究等领域资金投入的后果，以及萨根对宗教思想的看法。一些评论者还指出这本书的篇幅过长。尽管存在批评，这本书仍被认为对促进批判性思维具有深刻见解。

title: Broker-Side SQL Filtering with RabbitMQ Streams
summary:
This article introduces RabbitMQ 4.2's broker-side filtering capabilities for streams, using SQL filter expressions and Bloom filters to significantly reduce network traffic and client-side processing. The core problem addressed is the inefficiency of consuming entire high-throughput event streams when consumers only need a small subset of messages.

RabbitMQ's solution allows filtering messages on the broker based on criteria defined using SQL. This filtering can be combined with Bloom filters, which quickly eliminate entire chunks of messages that don't contain relevant data, further improving performance.

The article provides a practical example of an e-commerce platform event stream where only a tiny fraction (0.001%) of events meet specific criteria. Using SQL filtering alone, the broker can filter over 400,000 messages per second. Combining SQL filtering with Bloom filters dramatically increases the filtering rate to nearly 5 million messages per second, as Bloom filters pre-screen chunks, reducing disk I/O and CPU usage.

The key takeaway is that RabbitMQ's broker-side filtering, especially when Bloom filters are combined with SQL expressions, allows for highly selective consumption, optimizing network usage, client resources, and application code simplicity. This combination offers efficient chunk-level filtering followed by precise message-level filtering, all performed on the broker. The article encourages readers to explore the Stream Filtering guide for more details and best practices.
chinese_title: 使用RabbitMQ Streams的代理端SQL过滤
chinese_summary:
本文介绍了 RabbitMQ 4.2 的流式传输代理端过滤功能，它使用 SQL 过滤表达式和布隆过滤器来显著减少网络流量和客户端处理。其解决的核心问题是，当消费者只需要一小部分消息时，消费整个高吞吐量事件流的效率低下。

RabbitMQ 的解决方案允许基于使用 SQL 定义的标准在代理端过滤消息。这种过滤可以与布隆过滤器结合使用，布隆过滤器可以快速消除不包含相关数据的整个消息块，从而进一步提高性能。

本文提供了一个电子商务平台事件流的实际示例，其中只有极小一部分（0.001%）的事件满足特定条件。仅使用 SQL 过滤，代理就可以每秒过滤超过 40 万条消息。将 SQL 过滤与布隆过滤器结合使用可将过滤速率大幅提高到接近每秒 500 万条消息，因为布隆过滤器会预先筛选块，从而减少磁盘 I/O 和 CPU 使用率。

关键结论是，RabbitMQ 的代理端过滤，特别是当布隆过滤器与 SQL 表达式结合使用时，可以实现高度选择性的消费，从而优化网络使用、客户端资源和应用程序代码的简洁性。这种组合提供了高效的块级别过滤，然后是精确的消息级别过滤，所有这些都在代理端执行。本文鼓励读者探索流式传输过滤指南，以获取更多详细信息和最佳实践。

title: IBM Intellistation 185 AIX workstation (2016)
summary:
The IBM IntelliStation POWER 185, released in 2006, is an AIX workstation based on a modified System p5 185 (7037-A50) and utilizes the PowerPC 970 processor, despite being marketed as a POWER system. Its unique hardware virtualization support differentiates it from Power Mac G5s, which use the same CPU. It was designed for CAD and engineering applications, with a focus on quiet operation, and saw use primarily in the US and Japan.

The 185 features a PowerPC 970MP running in single-core mode, potentially for thermal reasons, with the option to add a second single-core chip to simulate a dual-core setup. IBM discontinued the System p5 185 shortly after release, but the IntelliStation 185 continued to be sold for longer.

The workstation was marketed towards high-end CAD users, running software like CATIA V5/V6 on AIX. However, the market shifted as Windows gained traction, and Dassault Systemes eventually dropped UNIX support for CATIA. IBM phased out the x86 IntelliStations in 2006 and the POWER IntelliStations in 2009. High-performance CAD GPUs from this era remain popular for AIX users due to a lack of modern alternatives.

Despite the push for POWER Linux, AIX offers better support for the 185's workstation hardware, including CAD cards, RAS, and the sound card. POWER Linux has limited support for the PowerPC 970, making AIX a more logical choice for utilizing the IntelliStation's capabilities.
chinese_title: IBM Intellistation 185 AIX 工作站 (2016)
chinese_summary:
IBM IntelliStation POWER 185于2006年发布，是一款基于修改后的System p5 185 (7037-A50)的AIX工作站，尽管被宣传为POWER系统，但它使用的是PowerPC 970处理器。 其独特的硬件虚拟化支持使其与使用相同CPU的Power Mac G5区分开来。 它专为CAD和工程应用而设计，侧重于安静运行，主要在美国和日本使用。

185采用单核模式运行的PowerPC 970MP，可能是出于散热原因，并可以选择添加第二个单核芯片来模拟双核设置。 IBM在发布后不久就停止了System p5 185的销售，但IntelliStation 185的销售持续了更长时间。

该工作站面向高端CAD用户，在AIX上运行CATIA V5/V6等软件。 然而，随着Windows的普及，市场发生了转变，达索系统最终放弃了对CATIA的UNIX支持。 IBM于2006年逐步淘汰了x86 IntelliStation，并于2009年逐步淘汰了POWER IntelliStation。 由于缺乏现代替代品，来自该时代的高性能CAD GPU仍然受到AIX用户的欢迎。

尽管大力推广POWER Linux，但AIX为185的工作站硬件（包括CAD卡、RAS和声卡）提供了更好的支持。 POWER Linux对PowerPC 970的支持有限，使得AIX成为利用IntelliStation功能的更合理的选择。

title: How did we all miss the bacteria taking over her body?
summary:
The article recounts a family's frustrating journey to diagnose and treat their daughter Milly's Lyme disease. Milly, once an active and energetic child, began experiencing debilitating fatigue, brain fog, and pain in 2021, eventually becoming unable to attend school. Despite multiple doctor visits and tests, her condition remained a mystery. The NHS eventually diagnosed her with ME/CFS (chronic fatigue syndrome), but the family felt this was insufficient and lacked a clear treatment path.

The author, a nature writer, highlights the irony of his daughter being afflicted by a tick bite after he preached the benefits of outdoor childhoods. The family explored various alternative treatments, including talking therapies and holistic approaches, without success. Milly's condition worsened, leading to social isolation and emotional distress.

Inspired by Miranda Hart's story, Milly suspected Lyme disease, but initial NHS tests were negative. The family sought a private doctor who specialized in Lyme and long Covid, ultimately leading to a positive T-spot test for Borrelia burgdorferi, the bacteria causing Lyme, along with co-infections. The author emphasizes the unreliability of standard NHS Lyme tests and a lack of awareness of the complexity of Lyme. The article ends with a sense of validation in finally identifying the cause of Milly's illness and the start of her treatment.
chinese_title: 我们怎么都错过了细菌侵占她身体这件事？
chinese_summary:
这篇文章讲述了一个家庭为诊断和治疗女儿米莉的莱姆病而经历的令人沮丧的旅程。 米莉曾经是一个活泼好动的孩子，但在2021年开始出现严重的疲劳、脑雾和疼痛，最终无法上学。 尽管多次就医和检查，她的病情仍然是个谜。 英国国家医疗服务体系最终诊断她患有ME/CFS（慢性疲劳综合征），但家人认为这不够充分，并且缺乏明确的治疗方案。

作者是一位自然作家，他强调了他女儿在宣扬户外童年好处后，却因蜱虫叮咬而患病的讽刺意味。 该家庭尝试了各种替代疗法，包括谈话疗法和整体疗法，但均未成功。 米莉的病情恶化，导致社交孤立和情绪困扰。

受米兰达·哈特的启发，米莉怀疑自己患有莱姆病，但最初的英国国家医疗服务体系的测试结果呈阴性。 该家庭寻求一位专门研究莱姆病和新冠后遗症的私人医生，最终导致伯氏疏螺旋体（导致莱姆病的细菌）的T-spot测试呈阳性，以及联合感染。 作者强调了英国国家医疗服务体系标准莱姆病测试的不可靠性，以及对莱姆病复杂性缺乏认识。 文章最后是对终于确定米莉的病因并开始治疗的一种确认感。

title: SSH3: Faster and rich secure shell using HTTP/3
summary:
SSH3 is a new secure shell protocol built on top of HTTP/3, aiming to improve upon SSHv2. It leverages QUIC+TLS1.3 for secure channel establishment and HTTP Authorization mechanisms for user authentication, promising faster session establishment (3 round-trip times vs. SSHv2's 5-7), and robustness against port scanning.

Key features include:

*   **Faster Session Establishment:** Achieved through HTTP/3's connection setup.
*   **Modern Authentication:** Supports OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect in addition to traditional methods.
*   **Hidden Servers:** SSH3 servers can be concealed behind secret URLs, mitigating scanning attacks.
*   **UDP Port Forwarding:** Enables forwarding UDP-based services.
*   **X.509 Certificates:** Allows server authentication using HTTPS certificates.
*   **OpenSSH Compatibility:** Implements many OpenSSH features, like authorized\_keys parsing, agent forwarding, TCP port forwarding, and proxy jumps.

The project is currently experimental and not recommended for production environments without expert cryptographic review. The article provides instructions for installing the SSH3 client and server using Go, as well as examples for setting up and using SSH3 with private keys, agents, and passwords. It also explains how to deploy the server with Let's Encrypt certificates or self-signed certificates. Community feedback and security review are encouraged.
chinese_title: SSH3：使用HTTP/3的更快更丰富的安全Shell
chinese_summary:
SSH3：基于HTTP/3的新型安全Shell协议

SSH3是一种构建于HTTP/3之上的新型安全Shell协议，旨在改进SSHv2。它利用QUIC+TLS1.3建立安全通道，并使用HTTP授权机制进行用户身份验证，承诺更快的会话建立（3次往返，而SSHv2为5-7次）以及抵御端口扫描的鲁棒性。

主要特性包括：

*   **更快的会话建立：** 通过HTTP/3的连接设置实现。
*   **现代身份验证：** 除了传统方法外，还支持OAuth 2.0和OpenID Connect。
*   **隐藏服务器：** SSH3服务器可以隐藏在秘密URL之后，从而减轻扫描攻击。
*   **UDP端口转发：** 能够转发基于UDP的服务。
*   **X.509证书：** 允许使用HTTPS证书进行服务器身份验证。
*   **OpenSSH兼容性：** 实现了许多OpenSSH功能，例如authorized\_keys解析、代理转发、TCP端口转发和代理跳转。

该项目目前处于实验阶段，未经专家密码学审查，不建议在生产环境中使用。文章提供了使用Go安装SSH3客户端和服务器的说明，以及使用私钥、代理和密码设置和使用SSH3的示例。它还解释了如何使用Let's Encrypt证书或自签名证书部署服务器。鼓励社区反馈和安全审查。

title: Solar panels + cold = A potential problem
summary:
This article warns EcoFlow solar generator users about a potential problem: cold temperatures increasing solar panel voltage and potentially damaging their equipment. The author explains that while users may calculate their solar panel configurations to be within the specified voltage limits of their EcoFlow devices under normal conditions, cold weather can significantly raise the Voc (open circuit voltage) of solar panels, exceeding those limits and causing damage to the MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracking) controller, voiding the warranty.

The article emphasizes the importance of staying *well* below the maximum voltage specifications, especially in colder climates. It provides rules for sizing solar arrays, including that voltage adds in series and amperage adds in parallel. It also covers what happens when using mixed panels.

The author suggests using conservative estimates or temperature coefficient calculations to determine the maximum Voc in cold temperatures. Two examples are provided: one for Georgia (mild climate) and one for Canada (cold climate), illustrating how to calculate the safe number of solar panels to connect in series based on expected temperatures and panel Voc specifications. The article concludes by linking to related articles, a Voc calculator, and relevant EcoFlow product pages.
chinese_title: 太阳能板+寒冷=潜在问题

本文警告EcoFlow太阳能发电机用户注意一个潜在问题：低温会导致太阳能板电压升高，并可能损坏他们的设备。作者解释说，虽然用户可能计算出其太阳能板配置在正常情况下符合EcoFlow设备规定的电压限制，但寒冷天气会显著提高太阳能板的Voc（开路电压），超出这些限制并导致MPPT（最大功率点跟踪）控制器损坏，从而导致保修失效。

本文强调了保持*远低于*最大电压规格的重要性，尤其是在寒冷地区。它提供了太阳能阵列尺寸的规则，包括电压串联增加和电流并联增加。它还涵盖了使用混合面板时会发生什么。

作者建议使用保守估计或温度系数计算来确定寒冷温度下的最大Voc。文章提供了两个示例：一个针对佐治亚州（温和气候），另一个针对加拿大（寒冷气候），说明了如何根据预期温度和面板Voc规格计算串联连接的安全太阳能板数量。文章最后链接到相关文章、Voc计算器和相关的EcoFlow产品页面。

title: Run 14 vintage OSes (Windows 1.01→XP, ReactOS, Haiku) in the browser
summary:
This article introduces the V86 x86 Emulator, a browser-based emulator that allows users to run a collection of vintage operating systems, ranging from Windows 1.01 to Windows XP, as well as ReactOS, Haiku, Android x86, and others, directly in their web browser.

Key features include a pre-configured collection of over 14 operating systems optimized for performance, along with the ability to upload custom OS images (.img and .iso files). Powered by WebAssembly, the emulator provides near-native performance for full x86 processor emulation. Users can interact with the OSes using complete mouse and keyboard support, including special key injection for maximum compatibility.

The emulator requires no installation, plugins, or downloads, offering a secure and convenient way to experience computing history. Its intended purpose is educational and for software preservation, providing a platform to learn about the evolution of operating systems. The V86 Emulator project is available on GitHub and is powered by copy (Fabian Hemmer).

title: A Postmark backdoor that’s downloading emails
summary:
Koi Research uncovered a malicious backdoor in the "postmark-mcp" npm package, a tool designed for AI assistants to manage emails. Beginning with version 1.0.16, the package secretly copies all emails to the attacker's server, giftshop.club. This includes sensitive data like passwords, invoices, and internal memos.

The attacker impersonated the legitimate Postmark (ActiveCampaign) package, adding a single line of code that BCCs every email without user knowledge. The package had been downloaded 1,500 times weekly and was integrated into many developer workflows, making it a trusted tool before the malicious update.

The compromised package highlights the significant risk of trusting third-party MCP (Mail Control Protocol) servers with extensive permissions (email, database access, API calls). These servers are often used by AI assistants without proper security review, bypassing traditional security measures.

The estimated impact is 3,000 to 15,000 emails being stolen daily. The attacker exploited the trust relationship, not a technical vulnerability. Koi's risk engine detected the anomaly, showcasing the need for proactive supply chain security.

Koi recommends immediate removal of postmark-mcp versions 1.0.16 and later, credential rotation, and auditing of all MCP server configurations. The incident underscores the broken security model of MCP ecosystems and the importance of verifying and continuously monitoring AI tools. The author emphasizes the need for a security checkpoint and approval process before integrating third-party packages, rather than relying on developers' choices.
chinese_title: 正在下载邮件的邮戳后门
chinese_summary:
锦鲤研究揭露“postmark-mcp” npm 包中的恶意后门，该工具专为 AI 助手管理电子邮件而设计。自 1.0.16 版本起，该软件包秘密地将所有电子邮件复制到攻击者的服务器 giftshop.club。这包括敏感数据，如密码、发票和内部备忘录。

攻击者冒充合法的 Postmark (ActiveCampaign) 包，添加了一行代码，在用户不知情的情况下密件抄送每封电子邮件。该软件包每周被下载 1,500 次，并集成到许多开发人员的工作流程中，使其在恶意更新之前成为一个值得信赖的工具。

被入侵的软件包突显了信任具有广泛权限（电子邮件、数据库访问、API 调用）的第三方 MCP（邮件控制协议）服务器的重大风险。这些服务器通常被 AI 助手使用，但未经过适当的安全审查，从而绕过了传统的安全措施。

据估计，每天有 3,000 到 15,000 封电子邮件被盗。攻击者利用了信任关系，而不是技术漏洞。锦鲤的风险引擎检测到异常情况，表明了主动供应链安全的需求。

锦鲤建议立即删除 postmark-mcp 1.0.16 及更高版本，轮换凭据，并审计所有 MCP 服务器配置。该事件强调了 MCP 生态系统存在缺陷的安全模型，以及验证和持续监控 AI 工具的重要性。作者强调，在集成第三方软件包之前，需要进行安全检查点和审批流程，而不是依赖开发人员的选择。

title: Handy – Free open-source speech-to-text app written in Rust
summary:
Handy is a free, open-source speech-to-text application designed to run locally on your computer. Created by CJ, Handy aims to make accessibility tooling readily available without paywalls.

The application transcribes speech into text, which is then pasted directly into the current text field. Users activate the transcription process using a customizable keyboard shortcut. The app offers two modes: a default "push-to-talk" mode, requiring continuous key press, and a toggle mode, activated by pressing the key combination to start and stop transcription.

Handy prioritizes privacy by processing audio locally, eliminating the need to send data to the cloud. Its purpose is single, transcription with simplicity in mind. The tool is kept free and open-source thanks to sponsors like Wordcab and Epicenter. Individuals can contribute to the project via donations, GitHub Sponsors, or by contacting the developers directly. Handy encourages community involvement to extend its functionality and ensure its continuous improvement.
chinese_title: 便捷 - 用Rust编写的免费开源语音转文本应用
chinese_summary:
Handy：一款免费开源的本地语音转文字应用。由 CJ 创建，旨在提供无付费墙的便捷辅助工具。

该应用将语音转录为文字，然后直接粘贴到当前文本字段中。用户可以使用可自定义的键盘快捷键激活转录过程。该应用提供两种模式：默认的“按住说话”模式（需要持续按键）和切换模式（按下键组合开始和停止转录）。

Handy 优先考虑隐私，通过在本地处理音频，无需将数据发送到云端。其目标单一，即以简洁的方式进行转录。该工具能够保持免费和开源，得益于 Wordcab 和 Epicenter 等赞助商。个人可以通过捐款、GitHub Sponsors 或直接联系开发者来为该项目做出贡献。Handy 鼓励社区参与，以扩展其功能并确保其持续改进。
